name: Purcell BRONSON, Appellant, v. Martin F. HORNE, Commissioner and his SCI-Huntingdon Agents, Appellees

parties: Purcell BRONSON, Appellant, v. Martin F. HORNE, Commissioner and his SCI-Huntingdon Agents, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 30th day of July, 1997, the order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
696 A.2d 806
Purcell BRONSON, Appellant, v. Martin F. HORNE, Commissioner and his SCI-Huntingdon Agents, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 30, 1997.
